name: Project2 (Ratintosh)
description:
project 2 is a game where you are a boy whos father goes missing. you gotta find him. its not actually that hard. this was made in rpgmaker in like an hour lmaooo

Mac users, read this:

To install, just unzip the game and launch the .app file. The file size is so large because thats just what winebottler does. Since theres no native way to export an RPGmaker VX Ace game onto Mac, I had to improvise by using winebottler.

Also, when you launch the mac build of the game, the screen might be lowered a bit. Just press option+return (alt+enter) to enter fullscreen. That seems to fix it.  In addition, the MacOS build might not work on M1 chips, I've only tested it on an Intel chip running Big Sur.
